metadata.title: SediaBoiler - Ready-Made Foundation, Smooth Coding
metadata.description: Ready-to-use UI component library with copy-paste code for Next.js and Tailwind CSS

hero.title: Ready-Made Foundation,
hero.description: A collection of modern UI components with copy-paste ready code. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS for Indonesian developers.

features.title: Why SediaBoiler?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build modern websites quickly

copyPaste.title: Instant Copy-Paste
copyPaste.description: Copy JSX/Tailwind code with a single click. No complicated setup required.

responsive.title: Responsive by Default
responsive.description: All components are optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Documentation
bilingual.description: Complete descriptions in Indonesian and English.

modern.title: Modern Design
modern.description: Components with clean and professional design for SaaS, landing pages, and dashboards.

customizable.title: Easy to Customize
customizable.description: Built with Tailwind CSS for easy color and styling customization.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Use for commercial or personal projects without restrictions.

library.title: Component Library
library.subtitle: Explore our collection of ready-to-use UI components

footer.description: Ready-to-use UI component library for Indonesian developers.
